thumb.title: (VOCALOID カバー) 約束の地 (ショートバージョン) / 初音ミク featuring
thumb.description: Producer's Note & Fun Fact: This is a cover of Hassy's song "Promised Land" from the Nitroplus visual novel Phantom of Inferno. This was my first VSQ completion. I'm good at adjusting, but I'm not good at handmade covers, so it doesn't sound the best. Tools and software used: Audacity Hatsune Miku V4X English version of Microsoft ClipChamp Ibis PaintXThis is a cover of Hassy's song "Promised Land" from the Nitroplus visual novel Phantom of Inferno. This was my first VSQ completion. I'm good at adjusting, but I'm not good at handmade covers, so it doesn't sound the best. Tools and software used: Audacity Hatsune Miku V4X English version of Microsoft ClipChamp Ibis PaintXCheck out my YouTube
